New Records: Aaron Judge hit his first home run of the postseason.
Yankees won 6-3, taking a 2-0 ALCS lead.
Key Match Events: Torres scored on an error in the first inning.
Judge hit a sacrifice fly for a run in the second inning.
Judge homered in the 7th inning, scoring Torres.
Ramirez homered in the 9th inning for the Guardians.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Game was played at Yankee Stadium with 47,054 attendees.
Yankees improved to 5-2 in the series.
